Text: Conference Call re Transition of Into Product to MISOAttached please find a copy of the memo from F Mitchell Dutton regarding Into Product Definition and Formation of Regional Transmission Organization for the pm EST Conference call today Please contact Mitch Dutton at or myself at if you have any questions or comments See attached file DOC Thank you DJ Stephens This email message from the Legal Department of American Electric Power is for the sole use of the intended recipients and may contain confidential and privileged information Any unauthorized review use disclosure or distribution is prohibited If you are not the intended recipient please contact the sender by reply email and destroy all copies of the original message DOC

Hotel ReservationsIf you are planning to attend the December Drafting Committee meeting here in Columbus Ohio and have not already made your hotel reservations please do so as soon as possible in order to get the discount AEP rate Their discount rate for AEP is per night plus tax Apparently they only have so many rooms with the discount rate The hotel is Courtyard by Marriott Downtown W Spring St Columbus Ohio I will be checking other hotels in the area to find out about discount rates and forward to you the information Please forward any names of individuals that you know will be attending the meeting who are not listed Please contact me if you have any questions Thank you DJ Stephens Assistant to F Mitchell Dutton This email message from the Legal Department of American Electric Power is for the sole use of the intended recipients and may contain confidential and privileged information Any unauthorized review use disclosure or distribution is prohibited If you are not the intended recipient please contact the sender by reply email and destroy all copies of the original message
